title: >>> Take that CHANCE
body_text:
With DODGEBALL XXX4 approaching, many are probably still wondering what this idea will be.
Will this new way of forming teams bring about more fun or more competition? Perhaps both? Perhaps neither? Those questions no one can answer. The very answers will come at the event itself.
Only a few events have not had the presence of captains. Most will remember DODGEBALL XTWO, still to this day the single largest attendance record in the history of dodgeball. If one can recall, XTWO actually had randomized teams simply selected by the sing-in sheet. DODGEBALL XXX-ONE, due to the extremely low attendance, also did not have captains as teams were formed based on where you were standing before the games began.
Below is the past history of captains battles from events past. Take note that there are no listings for events 3 through VI. That information was never recorded.
DODGEBALL DAY 1: Valerie Winston vs. Lauren Winston
DODGEBALL DAY 2: Valerie Winston vs. Lauren Winston*
....
DODGEBALL VII: Valerie Winston vs. Lauren Freda
DODGEBALL 8: Valerie Winston vs. Lauren Freda
DODGEBALL 9: Chris Adams vs. John Tronolone
DODGEBALL X: Steve Adams vs. Kevin Adams
DODGEBALL XONE: Mike Rosinksi vs. Kyle Carty
DODGEBALL XTWO: (None)
DODGEBALL 13: Dan Karen vs. Dan Spengeman ("The Battle of the Dans")
DODGEBALL XIV: Ben Cotta vs. Derek Carty
DODGEBALL 15: Kurt Gassner vs. Tom Adams
DODGEBALL X6: Sara DeCuir vs. Ryan McCrorey
DODGEBALL 17: Wesley Hebrew vs. Matt Larsen
DODGEBALL 18: Bill Plantz vs. Ryan Letsche
DODGEBALL 19: Zach Katz vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick
DODGEBALL 20: Jim Martin vs. John Tronolone
DODGEBALL 21: Liz Nogueira vs. Lauren Winston
DODGEBALL TWENTY-TWO: Diana DiBuccio vs. Alison Bertsch
DODGEBALL 23: Diana DiBuccio vs. Alison Bertsch
DODGEBALL XXIV: Matt Brown vs. Lenny Herrera ("Prodigy Captains")
DODGEBALL XXV: Ray Marzarella vs. Gerald Lewis
DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX: Kevin Megill vs. Steve Adams
DODGEBALL 27: Lauren Winston vs. Lauren Freda ("The Battle of the Laurens")
DODGEBALL XXVIII: Chris Adams vs. Steve Adams
DODGEBALL 29: Travis Mills vs. Zach Katz
DODGEBALL 30: Kevin Megill vs. John Tronolone
DODGEBALL XXX-ONE: (None)
DODGEBALL 32: Tom Adams vs. Ryan McCrorey
DODGEBALL 33: Robert Brown vs. Darien Brown ("Brown vs. Brown")
*Only believed to have taken place
In hopes that DODGEBALL XXX4 brings success, expect that list to grow slowly in the future.
Check back in the next few days for the DODGEBALL 35 preview ... the road "home" once again.

Only a few events have not had the presence of captains. Most will remember DODGEBALL XTWO, still to this day the single largest attendance record in the history of dodgeball.
